modName: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim MENU
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:

A simple and smart The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim MENU.


COMPLEMENTARY MODS:

1.- KenMOD - Time On Loading Screen

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/98

2.- SkyUI

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863

3.- No Menu And Loading Smoke

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7901


INSTALL:

Download using the nexus mod manager or download manually and unzip file, than merge the data folder with the data folder on your computer found in \"Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim\".



Thanks to:
All supporters, Bethesda & SkyrimNexus.
author: emd
